item.title: Welcome to "What's Cooking?"
item.description:
Over the years, I’ve been posting pictures on social media of what I’ve been cooking for me and my family. Friends have paid me many compliments, and have said they’ll miss my posts now that I’m off of social media. That’s why I’m introducing this section of my blog!

The plan is to post the delicious meals that I’m making, both old favorites and new recipes. I’ll even post the failures alongside the successes, discussing what could have been done to improve the recipe (in my opinion).

I AM NOT A PROFESSIONAL CHEF, just an amateur home cook. These posts are more for sharing and entertainment value. I hope you enjoy them!
